headingDescription: A clear and consolidated view of your financial situation. Securely connect all your accounts in one place.
featureheaderDesc: An incredibly easy to use interface. Whether you are a recent graduate, parents, entrepreneurs or just looking to improve your finances. Affordify is designed to provide financial clarity and empowerment.
appfeaturesubTitle1: Your finances just became more complex? We provide you with clarity.
appfeaturesubTitle2: Personal or business: stay on top of your finances.
appfeaturesubTitle3: Stay organized and ensure everyone's needs are accounted for.
descBank: All the big names and many more!
essentialSubtitle: Understanding your financial habits is the first step towards achieving your financial goals. Make it effortless with our unique personalised tools and advice
essentialDesc1: A new way to manage both personal and business finances in one place. Quickly select which accounts you desire to see to catch up with new trends.
essentialDesc2: View your overall financial progress evolving towards your goal. This provides you with a quick snapchat of where your your  financial health stands and quickly take action when necessary.
essentialDesc3: Get an accurate and comprehensive view of how your finances stack up against others in your age range, income bracket, and country. Our app will generate a detailed report that breaks down your finances by category.
securityDesc: Affordify takes its responsibilities with regard to data privacy, security and safery seriously.
securityDesc1: We never share or sell your personal information to third parties. There is no advertisement on affordify.io
securityDesc2: We understand the importance of security when dealing with financial data. We employ strong security measures to ensure your information is safe and confidential.
securityDesc3: Affordify DOES NOT collect or store your card information or bank credentials. Affordify cannot make transfers, payments or charge your card.
shoppingDescription: Receive personnalised recommendations to comfortably afford your purchase!
budgetruleDescription: Enjoy the present without putting your future in jeopardy!
chromeDescription: For live budgeting advice as you shop on your favourite websites.
retirementDescription: Explore retirement scenarios with our interactive tool!
investmentDescription: Discover various investment strategies that suit your goals!
roboDescription: An holistic approach to personal finance!
livingDescription: Browse up-to-date financial information of people just like you!
housingDescription: See a detailed breakdown of real estate costs in the city of your choice!
transportDescription: Make informed decision when deciding on your preferred transportation mode!
